title: One Tree One Book and One Cancer that changed the world: your time to change yours
description: Max was a boy who wanted to change the world.After a horrific accident where he lost his parents and found out he had brain cancer, Max wanted to do something.He wanted to change the world, to get people to stop cutting down trees.And then, it hit him.Max had a unique idea that changed the lives of the people of his town, and everyone loved it.But, what Max learned shortly after that was how impactful it could be, and how life could change in an instant.He also learned the importance of doing good things while youâ€™re alive, and the impact of what you do during life and how it can impact people once you leave this world.
author: Bassel Hamdan
